SEARCH
Package com.mygdx.game

Class ActionText

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.game.ActionText
public class ActionText extends Object
ActionText is used to report events occurring in the game. It is rendered directly to the screen and fades out naturally.
Author:
Franck Limtung (flimtung)

  • Constructor Details

    • ActionText

      public ActionText(String text, float x, float y, float lifespan, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Skin skin)
      Constructor creates an action text.
      Parameters:
      text - Text to write to the screen
      x - x position to render at
      y - y positionChange access modifier
      lifespan - How long the text should stay on the screen before beginning to fade away
      skin - Skin to create label with

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch, float deltaTime)
      Process this ActionText. Will update position and alpha, then draw on the screen.
      Parameters:
      batch - batch to draw with
      deltaTime - time passed since last render

    • expired

      public boolean expired()
      Checks if the text label is invisible (alpha = 0)
      Returns:
      True if the label is invisible, false if otherwise

    • setColor

      public void setColor(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
      Set the color of the text label.
      Parameters:
      color - LibGDX Color
